message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can work from there!
That's not how fair deals work! I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to negotiate. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 70%, you take 30%.  We can avoid further losses from inflation.
Okay, let's be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most efficient way to end this.  I'm losing money with every round!
